title: Could you be flexitarian?
description: Would you all but give up eating meat to save the environment?

vocabItems.definition: a diet based on eating mostly plant-based food and only occasionally eating meat
ethicaldoing something for ethical reasons means doing it as a moral choice because you believe it is the right thing to do
